content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car on my way to culinary school and i noticed what i thought was going to be an airplane to my left, the direction of the airport and i frequently watch planes take off and come in for landing. but when i looked directly at the object, i saw it wasn't a plane, but a black triangle with bright white lights at each corner and it was no more than 500 feet above tree tops and was stationary. i kept looking at it for about a minute while driving and noticed a plane take off in the distance, which further showed me how stationary this object was. every so often after that i would keep watching the object and check back to the road since i was driving, and after a total time of about two minutes of looking at this object it disappeared while i was doing a road check. the road check lasted only 3 - 4 seconds and the object had completely vanished from sight.
content.summary: Black triangle with a bright white light at each corner

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to hendersonville around 6 pm. high in the sky, too high for an airplane, but too stationary for a helicoptor, i spotted a large reflective object. it was shaped like an old telephone receiver. like 2 circles connected by a straight center. it was refelcting the sunset so it looked like it was glowing orange on the belly of it. to amke sure it was not a plane, i pulled over so i could watch its movement. it stayed stable in the sky. did not leave the spot it was in. this was too high for a blimp or hot air balloon. it was not moving or putting out a contrail, so it was not an airplane. the thing is, lately at sunset i have been seeing jets criss-crossing eachother and making huge x signals in the skies over nashville at sunset with their exhaust, anyone can go outside and see them. this object was hovering around those x marks.
content.summary: Stationary shiny object in sky over nashville at sunset

content.detailedDescription:
This is the fourth in a series of sightings, every night around 10 p.M.They are there, increasing in numbers every night. i am a pilot and there is no way that airplanes can move like these. they dart, zig-azg and change colors. it often looks like they are "docking" on larger craft. 

the sighting took place in my back yard, looking west. 

many other people around here are seeing them too, littleton, franconia, and even in gorham, about 40 miles away. people of all ages and backgrounds. 

my wife saw them too and she has never seen a ufo. i have seen many, in the air and in the gorham nh area, site of many sightings.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving changing lights over connecticut river valley in north-western nh

content.detailedDescription: I was out side and saw a bright yellow star in the sky, not blinking or glimmering, with a hint of red, then it slowly dimmed and went away. i looked again and it came back slowly, but not as bright... it seemed to zigzag slowly north east, then dimmed again. i hope my mind is not playing tricks on me.
content.summary: Star like object slow zig-zag, then disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my girl friends house around 10pm i usally take my boat out because i live on a lake and our houses are close by. about  10 min boat ride. as i was leaving i started the boat and was heading east to my house. something caught my eye to the southeast of my heading. my first intinct it was a planet in view maybe venus or mars because it was glowing. but i took astronomy in high school and it was to low and to bright. i am a man of reason, and to me everything has to have an explanation. i stopped the boat and looked closer, then when i did stop it was changing colors to green,red, and white. at this point i thought it was a plane, because there is a local airport nearby about 1 mile from my location over the trees. at the time the object was about 3 football fields away and 4,000 feet up. i started the boat again and was moving east at about 10 mph. i kept watching it, at the time i called my gf telling her what i saw, she thought i was crazy, i told her to come out and look at it, but she hated the dark and said it was too cold, so i hung up. i am a emergency medical techinian at a local hospital and people take me very seriously, so when i tell somebody what happen this night they belive me. i stopped the boat again, and the object got closer and dropped alttitude to about 1,000 to 2,000 feet, and 200 yards or so. i was about 5 minutes from my house. i was getting scared by this time, as i stopped again the object was now closer about 500 feet up and 100 yards away. it seemed when i stopped and started, it got closer and lower, i knew now this was not a aircraft or star or planet, it was deffiniatly a ufo. this time i could see it very clear, no sound, medium sized object sphere star like shape, changing colors every 4 seconds, to red white and green. after the 3rd time i had enough, and floored my boat back to my house and ran inside. before i went inside i looked back and the object was gone. i never belived in ufo's or aliens but after this september night. u can bet i do now. i never do drugs drink or nething to conflit with my well being and this is the first time i told ne body about it. i used to go on the lake at night, now i dont go out at all unless im with somebody. i am 21 years old, and i have never been so scared in my life.
content.summary: Strangest night i ever had

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, 17 sept, 2007, myself, my husband, and two of our out of state {w. va} friends were at our pond on our property in southwest virginia. we had fished for a couple of hours, then built a fire, had some supper, and eventually gathered the lawn chairs around the fire and played music. the other three were all picking various acoustic instruments, while i sat back listening, watching the sky occasionally, and enjoying the music for an hour or so. i stretched out, and just looked over my left shoulder while flexing my neck muscles. a bright yellow orange light caught my eye, coming from the north over clinch mt., and moving in an easterly direction. i immediately sat up, turning toward it. it was stationary at first, then moved forward slowly, hovered, and then moved back again to its original position. i knew then it was not a plane. i grabbed my husbands knee, as he was picking a banjo, and pointed to the object. he looked and stopped playing immediately after watching for just a couple of seconds. he then told our friends, who were sitting with their backs to the object, to "stop now, and get a look at this". it was that quickly apparent that this was out of the ordinary. the time was approximately 23:15, on a clear night, no clouds, and no background lights, as we live in the country. we watched this light go in a controlled yet occasionally erratic pattern for about three minutes. at one point, it went from a 1 or 2 o'clock position, to a 7 o'clock position, then back. it would hover, then go forward slowly, deliberately, and had occasional almost jerking movements back to its previous hovering point, then jumping ahead slightly, and moving smoothly. i had a nikon d50 with me, and a hitachi digital dvd camera. neither of them would work. they both had fully charged li ion batteries. [i had both of these present, and fully charged, to record some of our annual get-together music]. i was very surprised about my digital slr, as i quickly changed settings, wondering why it would not work, as i had taken several shots previous to this sighting. i tried to just fire the flash of the camera, to see if there would be a reaction of some sort from the object. the flash would not fire. i was torn between trying to figure this out, knowing i'd be missing part of what this object was doing. i tried the the video cam...Nothing. it would not record. i put them both down, deciding to just watch, while mentally cursing the manufacturers of what i thought was fairly good digital equipment. by this time, the object was halfway between clinch mt. and pine ridge. we continued watching its movement, fairly slow, deliberate, with occasional moments of hovering, until it could no longer be seen over pine ridge. no blinking lights were seen by three witnesses. the fourth thought he might have seen a blinking red light, but not at all times. there was absolutely no sound. the estimated time of sighting is three minutes. i knew something extraordinary had been seen, and we were all fascinated, not really knowing what to think, except that it was definitely not a plane or helicopter. while the event occurred, it seemed to me personally that i was seeing it, yet at the same time not really believing that this was something i could not explain. just remarkable; i really can not find the perfect word. totally amazing falls a bit short.

for informational purposes, about 5 minutes later, i picked up the nikon to see if i could take a shot; it worked perfectly, still showing a full battery charge.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Controlled flight with erratic movement seen for approx. 3 minutes from yellow-orange globe by 4 witnesses in sw va

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i have told what i saw to a few people and they said i should contact you.  i was walking my dogs with my wife and 1 year old son around 7-8 p.M. on wednesday september 19th 2007 and noticed a large very bright object in the sky.  it seemed to have blue and yellow streams of light flying around it.  at first i thought it might be a planet such as venus so i just mentioned it to my wife and said let's see if it moves.  so during our walk with our dogs we kept an eye on it.  then when we reached our house i could see it clear as day right from my front door step.  it was far away but it looked unusual enough that i figured i would take a photo of it.  as soon as i took the photo is start to move upwards at that is when i knew this was no star but could not figure out what else would glow so intensly and stay in one position for more than 10 minutes not to mention the strange strands of blue and yellow it had moving around it.  after it moved upwards it slowing started to move towards us, but then it suddenly sounded like a small plane, we were in a bit of shock so i forgot to take another photo, and when i heard the plane engines i also thought it might just be an aircraft of some sought but still could not understand how it glowed so bright.  anyway, it flew right over our heads and i looked straight up underneath it.  it was about the size of a large fighter jet but looked very different from anything i had seen before.  it was a trianular shape on on each front side of the triangle were 3 massice lights.  it didn't fly fast as it past over our heads.  after this all happend i took my iphone in to my computer to get the photo off it.  unfortunatly it does not have a zoom.  but i am a web designer and have software so i put it into photoshop and then changed the dpi to 300 so i could get a clear view.  i enlarged it and what i saw was even stanger than the first part.  it may have been an accident or something wrong with the camera but the zoomed in version looked like an aliens head, with a large bright square box in the middle, no joke, the box has a missing right corner and this is why i contact you.  after this i looked on youtube and did a search under gulf breeze ufo and came across a video of the well known ed walters who also lives here in gulf breeze.  he has one part of his video that shows a craft that is exactly the same as what i saw flying out of the light.  it has 3 massive lights on each site, but his photo is shot from the side.  at that point i really regreted not shooting the photo of the craft as it passed over but as it sounded like a plane, i just thougt it must be.  but when i think back the engine sounded much too small for that size of plane and those lights on the front seemed way too big for it to carry or need.  any way, as you might think this has really freaked me and my wife out and i just wanted to mention it to someone.  i also wanted to know if you know how i can reach ed walters as i would like to ask him about what he saw. i would also like to add that the photo was taken by an iphone, so i have no access to the film to edit it.  the first one attached is the far away version, the second is the zoomed version.  again this is only the photo of the light, the thing that flew out may have been it, or something coming from it, i'm not sure but i have attached a screen shot from the ed walters video so you can see what i saw. thanks
content.summary: Bright glowing object with blue and gold strangs of light

content.detailedDescription: i went outside in my back yard around 11:00pm to sit in my fully reclyning patio chair and do some star gazing with my binoculars as i had started doing in the middle of the month every night around 10or11:00pm. sometimes i would sit and look at the stars for two or three hours at a time. whether i saw alot or only a couple ufos. even the very first night i decided to go out and look at the stars was the night i saw the most number of ufos. the ufos i saw were always very high in the sky, most alot higher than commercial planes fly some were a little closer but i still could not see any detail of the ufo. some look like they're moving very fast and others alot slower. i would usually see them one at a time as i paned across the sky until i saw what looked like a moving star and i'd follow it all the way across the sky until it was out of sight. some look like white light and others a yellowish or gold color light but never flashing or blinking. some nights i would see ten or more of them. one time i saw one following right behind another. usually they travel just in a streight line but once one was traveling in a streight line until it crossed in front of a bright star then cut at an angle in a different direction. never any sound and they look soo odd the way they move its like nothing i've seen. on this paticular night in august i saw the strangest ball of light i've ever seen. it was a closer looking white light i happend to pan across when it faded out. so i kept my binocs on that same spot until it appeared again in what looked like a slightly different spot and again slowly faded out so i counted the seconds in between this time, about every five seconds it would reappear in a different spot about the same space from the last, it went up,down, and across at different angles. each time i counted the seconds in between and it was always five seconds, i saw the light reappear around twenty times then it stopped. i was excited, amazed, and puzzled about it as i am every time i see these things.
content.summary: I saw a strange white ball of light fade in and out in a different spot each time.

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling west on us 90 on 9/6/07 at 11:12 am mountain time my wife was taking pictures of the beautiful landscape. i was driving about 75 miles per hour and she shot the pictures through our ranger truck front and side windows.

when we got home yesterday and loaded the pictures from my canon s60 digital camera set on auto to my computor and viewed them i saw objects i can identify.

picture #6 has at least 4 objects ( upper sky center)
picture #7 has one (upper sky left)

at the time neither of us saw them. we have many, many pictures of landscapes taken with this camera and never have seen anything like this.

feel free to use them in what ever manner you wish.

jerry schilling
content.summary: Taking landscape pictures and objects are in sky part of pictures

content.detailedDescription: On wed, sept 19, i went outside because the neighborhood dogs were barking, in particular one that never does. i was sitting on the front porch looking out over the trees to the west toward brady lake. suddenly there was a red vertical strobe that extended several hundred feet in the air. i thought "i didn't know there was a tower over there."  i'm a pilot and know where these are. i looked again. there isn't one. i had a sense of being watched and there was a loud buzzing in my head.
content.summary: Red strobe like a radio tower where none exists

content.detailedDescription: Go to my website @ http://www.Angelfire.Com/pa5/sharonyahweh/ministry.Html to see picture of the ufo that we seen. the picture is @ bottom of my website.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from work taking the usual route lsd south to the i55 south and exit off at circero avenue (midway airport).  i was on the i55 when traffic came to a dead stop just around wentworth avenue. from here the traffic was moving a few feet every couple mintutes. typical scenery here is lots of midway airport plane traffic and birds. and thats what i saw, as always. except, i first noticed was a gold/red contrail like on fire inside with a ball of light going down not up. i looked and looked and could see no aircraft attached to the top of this. it was very short and vertical hovering about 200 feet above the southbound side of traffic in front of me. i kept watching and wondering what the heck is that contrails dont go from the ground up. seeing contrails is normal around all this airplane traffic but not like this. while that was happening in front of me about half a mile in distance. i saw a flash of silver light on my right side. i looked and thought it might be reflection from a bird or a plane. i saw a whitish/silver orb that from my point of view looked to be about 300 feet up . it did not fly but it moved slightly for about 1 minute. now iam trying to look at two odd things while driving. i thought ok maybe just a bird and pay attention to the contail in front of you so you dont get in an accident. when i turned my attention back to the contrail i saw that it had changed to what i can only discribe as a rocket like white/blue contrail as i got closer to it i saw what looked like a small black round ball at the top of it. then as i paid my attention forward in traffic the orb/disc reappeared on the other side of the south bound traffic hovering again this time right by the contrail and then a commerical plane flew right over these to objects. these orbs/disc were from my point of view the size of about 4 of those large work-out balance balls put together. i kept thinking is anyone else seeing this. they would have too.  the orb/disc dissappeared into thin air after about 2 minutes. then i found myself driving right underneath this rocket contrail that hadnt moved an inch from its original spot. it was almost like you could touch it. i tried to keep looking for it in my rear veiw and it continued as last seen until i counldnt track it anymore.  then traffic was easing up a little and again saw the same orb/disc now back on the the right side of the highway. i watched again it just hovered and dissappeared into thin air. then as i reached my cicero exit i could see over the train tracks the orb hovering really low and next to the setting sun .
content.summary: Bright fire colored vertical contrail and 4 whitish silver orbs/discs over the i-55 highway.

content.detailedDescription: I was on some property walking around with my dog. this is about a 1/2 mile down on hwy 9 from hwy 287. as i was looking towards alma(fairplay is also in that direction)i saw what appeared to be a triangle shaped bright light in the sky. there were no clouds in the sky. the shape appeared to be motionless as i continued to look at it for about 2 minutes. then it shot off in the direction of buena vista and disappeared from my view, not due to moving behind anything, it just vanished from my sight. i didn't have any idea what it might be when i first saw it. the only thing we ever saw in the sky normally were planes(always with chem trails). i mentioned the sighting to my parents, but never to anyone else. i'm not an expert on things that fly in the sky, but i certainly have never seen anything to explain the objects i've seen in the sky there.I grew up in leadville, and then fairplay. i've seen things i can't explain in the skies in park county 5 times over the course of the time i lived there. this time was a bit distinct because i could clearly make out the shape of what i saw. it seemed fairly close and low. i also saw something in the sky in leadville with my dad, but only once.
content.summary: I was standing outside on my parents property looking towards alma and saw this triangle shaped light hanging in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been working on a feature film just off the blue ridge parkway near roanoke, virginia for a month.  on tuesday night, september 18, 2007 i observed a seemingly very bright, multi-colored (green/red/blue) strobing (constant) aircraft on the wesern horizon over what appeared to be either the blue ridge mountains or near the town of vinton, va.  distance was impossible to guage.  the craft was far too bright to be a star i thought.  then, a moment later, i noticed that the vehicle was not stationary, but instead was making erratic movements.  these movements were both on a vertical plane as well as cricular and without reasoning.  the movement was nearly constant, and without any patern.  it would suddenly move up and down on the same vertical plane for several passes, then come to a stop.  then it would move in semi-circles, sometimes changing directions immediately in opposite directions.  movement was both minor as well as severe at points.  because there was no way to tell how far away the craft was, i cannot judge the distances of these movements up down and around.  i asked two other people sitting nearby to come verify what i was seeing and not only did they verify my observations, but spotted another vehicle which looked exactly the same, only this craft was much closer, appearing just over the top of a nearby set of trees.  we all confirmed that the vehicles were emitting exactly the same colors and strobing patters and that both were making similar extreme movements.  it was our collective opinions that known craft would be hard pressed to make such aerodynamic movements based upon our limited knowledge of modern aircraft.  additionally, since we were situated away from the cities near the blue ridge parkway, we had a very unobstructed viewing given the lack of lights out there.  these crafts rose proportionately to each other in the night sky over the course of the next three hours.  then, last night (september 19, 2007) we observed the same aircraft, first on the wesern horizon again, then watched as two more identical vehicles appeared in a quasi-triangular spacing over the lower western horizon, again looking and acting the same way as the night before.  they remained active again for several hours.  i would like to say that i do not rule out military aircraft as i believe there is a base in the general area of roanoke, va.  but i would hasten to add that although these may indeed be military, they were awfully brightly lit, which goes against accepted procedures for military aircraft lighting, strobing constantly as opposed to the expected flash lighting of commercial aircraft, and most importantly, were dead quiet (although range was again, impossible to determine) and demonstrated extremely severe maneuvers for conventional aircraft to make.  if these craft were as far away as i suspect (5-15 miles) that would make the movements we observed extremely fast and covering the distance of perhaps miles in mere seconds, with dead stops and 180 degree countermovements producing in my opinion, excessive structural stress.  again, if these were military, they are clearly testing anti-gravity matter devices.  a few digital phtos were taken, not by myself however, and appear as an amber globe.  

t.A.B.
rochester, wi
content.summary: Multiple craft sightings for extended periods of time, all appearing the same, all exhibiting similar unnatural aerodynamics.

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas standing at the roof top of  my  house ,i just had sex with my newly wedded wife.I lite a cigarette and was re living the momemts i spended just now.I was exhsling the smoke towerds the sky that wsa the exact momemnt i saw a star like object which was bright enough and was moving  towerds north-east,then suddenly for a secound the light became brighter than erlier, then it just switched off just like we switch off the bulbs of our houses.I did not understood what it was and how it did like that.I have seen aircrafts in flight their lights blink.Because my house is not far away from the nearest airport which is the jai prakash narayan airport of patna-bihar,{ india }.I do watch lots of aircraft so i know it was not an aircraft for sure.

      i want you to tell me what i saw.I had this sighting on april 13 year 2003.
      time slowly pessed by and i was involved in my daily life,then on september 19 year2007 the history channel,was showing a programm on ufo they were showing about the wright petterson usaf air force base.That day i thought that i should visit the website of mufon,because i came to know about the organisation through the history channel.

      please contact me at my e-mail address which is as follwos :-
      ashmri@rediffmail.Com  or  gulluji13@yahoo.Co.In

                                  thanking you in anticipation
                                     brajesh kumar
content.summary: It looked like a star

content.detailedDescription:
I have been seeing ufo's since i was in grade school (which was many years ago). and of course, no one believes you. so after awhile you just stop telling people and deal with it on your own.

california is right - there is usually a very loud buzzing in your head.  you can break this - but it does require a strong will and conscience - do not be passive.  you may be left alone then because you will be too strong for whatever it is that wants to manipulate us (for whatever reason).  maybe one day we will all understand.
content.summary: 1 sighting: observed two ufo's flying at 500 ft  above a small creek.

content.detailedDescription: Newquay, porth beach. i had been waitressing at the glendorgal hotel and stepped out onto the terrace for a break alongside two of my colleagues. i noticed them straight away as soon as i stepped outside as they were very striking and i immediatley knew they were not easily explainable. about 20-30 balls of red light flew overhead travelling at the exact same speed, same distance apart. they were about as high as low flying air craft and made no sound whatsover. they each disappeared into the exact same point in the cloud. i, and my two colleaugues were in awe of the craft and tried to come up with some kind of explanation. i was half thinking of running in to get my camera phone but i mwas mezmerised by them and felt very excited.
content.summary: Red balls of fire

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling along the motorway - m42 heading north, we passed kingsbury oil refineary. just south of the oil terminal we saw distinctly and clearly in the sky 10-12 glowing orange/amber spheres. they appeared stationary. an aircraft approached and passed close over them and the lights moved closer together. 
aircraft lights presumably from birmingham international airport which is close by and has its approach path to the south,circled the lights and must have seen them. 
i was travelling with my wife who watched the lights untill we left them in the distance.
my reaction remains that they were clearly distinct from the aircraft which were in the sky at the time, but i am unclear what they were other than lights.
there was no camera in the car to take photo's but i'm sure the aircraft would have seen the lights and the radar at birmingham would have picked them up.
content.summary: Group of small bright orange/amber lights

content.detailedDescription:
while taking a walk thru a vacant field with my friend (and neighbor), we heard a loud propulsion type sound from above. when we looked up to see what is was, we noticed a huge craft in the sky. it was massive, probably the size of a football field, and was comprised of rings that broke it up into several sections. each ring featured different colored lights than the other ones. it also had one huge light in its center, that we thought might be some sort of tractor beam. we were young boys, approximately 7-9 years of age, but we knew it was a ufo immediately. it was moving very slowly, and heading west toward the city of moorpark, ca.

we were nearly breathless, and stood still because we thought we might get beamed up by that huge light in the center (of the craft). once it passed over us, we relaxed a little, and then got exited about telling our parents what we had just witnessed. we could see it for about 10 minutes until it got too far away. the craft never changed speed or direction and continued heading west. 

  then, we went home to tell our parents. my dad said that we were full of it, but the next day the sighting was featured in an article in the enterprise, the local simi valley newspaper. we showed him the newspaper, but he still insisted that we, and the other eye-witnesses, were all crazy. according to the article, most of the other witnesses saw it in moorpark about 15 minutes after we did. this made perfect sense, as it was headed in that direction very slowly. 

not too long ago, i noticed a sighting posted on mufon, that seemed earily similar to ours. not only was the description of the craft almost identical, but the location was as well (simi valley). and, as if that wasn't enough, there were even more bizarre similarities! the man was also about the same age as us at the time of his sighting as well (perhaps a year or two older). his description of the ufo gave me goose bumps too. he described it as a huge craft with many different colored lights, with colors reminding him of a christmas tree. this is what really made me want report this encounter. when i have the chance, i am going to the simi library to see if that article from the newspaper is in their archives. this way i can find out the exact date and a more exact time.
content.summary: A massive circular craft comprised of several rings that had many colored lights of several colors with a huge light or beam in the center

content.detailedDescription: I was at home working on my artwork. there was a very bad thunder storm going on. when it was over i noticed the sun came out and thought it was in the right position for a rainbow. instead i witnessed a beautiful cloud formation like i've never seen. i started taking pictures and didn't notice anything unusual untill i downloaded them into my pc. that's when i noticed the "ufo's" in many different positions in and around the clouds. i became very excited and maybe a bit scared. i figured right away it was an ufo. i was snapping the pictures rather fast. not quite burst speed but fast enough to just focus. i took pictures until the cloud dispered behind smaller cloud cover then went back home.I have shown them to a couple people and they believe as i do that it was not an airplane. so i'll leave it up to the experts. the first pic is a cut-out of the second picture. i have several more of the object in different places. thank you!
content.summary: A dark spot moving in and around the cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I just wrote earlier about possible ufo sighting at the "samuels service center" outside sandpoint, id. after looking at photos (the ones i reduced) i sent to your site, they looked horrible! i didn't realize when i resized them (to transfer them quicker) they would reduce the quality so much. so, here is photo 98, which is the one where the object appears in its full size 2274 x 1074 approx. please advise if you wish to have the other ones (right before and after) full size as well.

sincerely
content.summary: Possible ufo sighting (better photos)

content.detailedDescription:
Around 5:30 pm, i was at the samuels service center which is a gas station/resteraunt. i parked to the right of it (facing west) because i saw some interesting cloud formations i wanted to take photos of. i was alone and started to snap photos on my minolta digital dimage. it was set on continous shooting, (approx) 1/10 second, on the largest file size - 2274 x 1704. 

i wasn't aware of anything unusual until i got home around 7pm and started loaded the photos onto my hp printer. i use a sandisk 1.0 gb card to store photos and then transfer to my laptop. when i looked at photos, series 97-100, on 98 i noticed an object on the very right hand side. after having my husband look it over today, he advised me to write and ask if you'd like me to forward the photos. i do have before and after shots, however, the one exactly before the possible ufo, i had the camera a bit more to the left. then on frame 98, i moved to the right and caught the image. on frame 99, the object is gone. since i use the highest image size, the camera shoots the image at approx. 1 image per 1/10 sec  (properly a bit more). 

please advise if you'd like me to send the image as large as it's original size. i did make copies and resize the image so they would transfer quite a bit faster. they are quite large, as i wrote prior. also, please note, i resaved the copy as a jpeg while i originally opened them in paint shop pro. finally, i do have more photos of the area taken at the same time from different angles and also the exact same angels but at different times. 

sincerely
content.summary: I didn't realize i seen anything until i looked at the photos i took on my minolta.

content.detailedDescription: After some report of ufo sightings by military aircrafts in greece in that week's newspaper none in crete paid attention. me and my friend were drinking at a tavern. we were seven(7) at the age of 25 more or less. we decided to walk home. two ahaid, three in the middle(including me) and two at the back we were walking home. at some point the two ahaid were upon a small bridge and me and the two others a couple hundred meters behind at the top of a hill with the two in front in sight and the two behind very far back. while the two in front were crossing the bridge a flash of light like led white light came from nowhere and pointed at them for some seconds and then it vanished. me and the two others run to the bridge to look up our friends when they popped up from some bushes shouting and very very frightened. they told us that they were very scared with the light and hided preparing to defend for their lives with the unknown. the story is true and more or less as it happened. i am sorry that i cannot give a name but i am very sceptical about reporting this. it has been too long since this happened to remember details.
content.summary: Walking late after fist with friend (7) flash from above upon the 2. witnessed by me and 4 others.

content.detailedDescription: As soon as i posted my warning my head began to throbe feels like it's going to explode. you have to trust me i can tell by your post they know you've seen them and they will keep appearing for you then you'll feel a buzz in your head that will go on for a few days accompanied by horrible nightmares then you'll begin to hear them and thats when their fun begins
content.summary: Head my warnings conoga park poster

content.detailedDescription:
They have been tormenting me for months no one would believe the stories i could tell except for the guy in slc utah who has also been posting warnings. at night they look like a star that moves and flashes and disappears in the day they appear as balloons or a light in the sky.
don't keep looking for them don't make the same mistake i did.
content.summary: Canoga park don't look for them they are not very nice

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was watching "the office" at 10:45 and decided to go out for a smoke on the deck during the commercial. after sitting down i noticed through the trees what looked like a very large star, much larger than the north star, shimmering in the sky. the color was predominatly white, but there were distinct flashes of red and a turquise green every few seconds. since i do live close to both an aircraft plant and private airport i assumed it was a helicopter in the distance, that was traveling towards or away from me at an angle that made it appear to be still. i kept my eye on it and upon finishing the cigarette a few minutes later, it was the same size, distance, and there was still no noise that would make me think it was an approaching copter. i called out my mother to ask her opinion, and she agreed it didn't resemble aircraft or a star. we then summoned my sister, who also confirmed it was odd. my mother suggested we try another point of view, so we headed to the driveway, where we had a much clearer shot. we stood there for a few moments and my mom suggested we turn around and look at a star for a few seconds then turn around to compare it. upon turning around, it was clear this didn't resemble a star in the slightest. then a plane went by passing it closely, as the plane passed, our 'object' dimmed almost dissappearing. then upon the plane gettting further away, it brightened to it's original state. then only watching it for a short time we saw at least 4 planes come withing close distance, but it only dimmed a couple of those times. one advantage of the planes going by was that it made it clear this was not a recognizable aircraft. we did notice minor movements, slowly up a bit, or to the left. about a half hour later, everyone else elected to go inside, but i stayed for a while. i sat back down in the original chair i had spotted it in to light another cigarette and it was no longer visible from that spot, so it must have moved more significantly than we had suspected. after a while i did decide to opt for bed as well, but did check to see if it was still there, over 75 minutes after the original sighting, and it seemed to be the same strength light and position. this morning, it was as clear a morning as it was last night, and there was nothing there that would explain it. i will have my eyes peeled this evening to see if i can find a logical explaination or chalk it up to "unknown".
content.summary: Large flashing star

content.detailedDescription: We had just gotten home from a trip to gainesville. when we arrived at the condo it was about 4:45 am. around 5:00 i went for a ciggarette with two friends on the porch. i noticed how clear the sky was for the storm we were supposed to be expecting. i also noticed how bright the north star appeared to be and questioned its placement, then thought maybe it was a planet. iasked my friends what they thought and then i noticed it had a huge bright reflection in the water similair to the way the moon would, but the moon was not out at the moment. about as soon as we began to question the star we saw it move, just a little at first but in an akward way. it began to dance in exactly the ways i had seen before on tv of recordings others had made. it was a brighyt white light that gave the illusiion at first it was a star but then when it moved closer to us it was very apperent it wasnt. it moved so fast and appeared as though in just one second it could have been where we were. igrabbed a light toy and began to make a circular shape with my arm. when  i would do this it would always move and then a strange lighting would strike, but only when i used the light. at times it appeared there were others but much farther away. it also looked as though it was sucking stars right out of the sky but we could not be for sure. for certain moments when i would stare to hard in awe it felt as though i had been temporarily hjypnotized in an intriguing but somewhat parylizing light. this game of light tag went on for about two hours and as the sun began to rise a strangely shaped set of very low and close to shore clouds rolled in out of nowhere. they almost appeared as a giant mass of land coming to shore. this part was actually a bit frighting. the water was completely still, and the air grew very still as well and humid and hot. as the sun began to show we watched it continually move out ward away from us but still darting around until it looked like a star. during the daylight it was still very visible and still moving enough to the point where other early risers on th beach saw it when i asked them. beforew it faded out of sight we saw one more much closer and more definable come into our vision and out very quickly and quietly across the sky. it appeared tyo be a metalic texture and oval sheped. we watched for another hour and didnt see anything else. thank you for hearing my story...Please write or contact and help me understand this. my other friend eric fisher has also contacted you with this story as he was the one with me. thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be the north star but had a bright reflection on the beach. when it began to move i was interested in the flight pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my husband first saw a star-like object appear high in the sky as we floated on an air mattress in our pool two weeks prior to my sighting on saturday sept. 15th. 

this first object seen by my husband and i appeared to remain stationary for about 15mins before moving to the right and disappearing. then it re-appeared in the same spot we saw it initially, with then three more star-like objects appearing to the right. we watch for about an hour and then they disappeared. 

on sept. 15th, i went out to the pool again around 3-3:30. knowing that we had seen something weeks before, i just laid back to watch the sky and again a star-like object appeared. it again moved to the right and was met by another one, which appeared to come extremely close to the other. they were very close for a couple of minutes, and then seemed to spaced out a bit and remained this distance from one another as they both moved to the right and disappeared. 

the object re-appeared in the initial place where i first saw it, and moved to the right once again, and stayed there. then out of no where, another star-like object shooted right passed it and out of sight, as another one appeared close to it. in total, i saw 3- and i watched this for about an hour and a half until they disappeared. i also called my mom and told her what i was seeing as i laid in the pool. i thought it was strange and interesting and now i'm in my pool everyday trying to see more.
content.summary: 3 starlike objects seen in canoga park

content.detailedDescription: I was lying down in my car and looking at the sky and the sky was bright blue and all of the sudden i thought i saw a seagull flying and sometimes around here they fly very high but this was even higher than usual; and it was prefectly round  and watched it fly from north to south  very striaght and i knew it wasnt a seagull  and then it veered to  the right and it disappeared into the blue..This was in cvs parking lot islip ny
content.summary: Round object flying north to south white in color

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting ready for work, then relaxed on my bed.
i then heard thunder verry loud thunder constant thunder.
i ran outside in my front yard and looked beyond the trees in front of me
and saw 2 red very fast blinking lights flying side by side upwards and
were dancing together....I panic and ran into the house and grabbed my fiance and roomate and they also saw the red lights zoom here and there then they disappered.
my roomate went inside the house and my fiance and i stayed outside.
looking..
a few seconds later 2 huge bright white lights zoomed in on us..
i took off running in the house and left my fiance outside (what a man)
the bright light faded 1 after the other and parted back to where they were flying with each other....Todays date is 9/18/07...
i gurentee they will come back tonight...I will try get any footage i can.
please get ahold of me...Thank you
content.summary: 2 red lights circling droping and disappering....Came together and shined bright white lights then parted very fast
